WSUS05 KKCI 031317 
SLCU WS 031317 
SIGMET UNIFORM 5 VALID UNTIL 031717 
SIGMET  
UT CO AZ NM 
FROM 30NNE DBL TO 50ESE CIM TO 40ENE SSO TO DRK TO 30NNE DBL 
OCNL SEV TURB BLW FL180. DUE TO STG LOW LVL WNDS AND STG UDDFS 
AND LLWS. CONDS CONTG BYD 1717Z.
==
